creditline: Museum purchase, John Maclean Magie, Class of 1892, and Gertrude Magie Fund
inscribed:
Incised on low plinth, top, proper left rear:  MAC-MONNIES / Sculpt;
Front left side of base, inscribed: LeBlanc-Bardienne Fondeur.;
